thread.title: Woman Killed In Washington County House Fire
thread.title_full: Woman Killed In Washington County House Fire

author: CBS Pittsburgh
title: Woman Killed In Washington County House Fire
text:
Woman Killed In Washington County House Fire February 18, 2017 6:11 AM Filed Under: East Bethlehem Township , Fatal Fire , House Fire (Photo Credit: Tim Lawson/KDKA) 
EAST BETHLEHEM TOWNSHIP (KDKA) — A woman was killed in a house fire in Washington County early Saturday morning. 
It happened just before 1 a.m. at a home on Step Street in East Bethlehem Township. 
The Washington County coroner’s office identified the victim as 40-year-old Chanel Bikowicz, of Clarksville, Pa. 
Bikowicz and one other person were trapped inside the home when the fire broke out. Bikowicz died in the fire. She was pronounced dead at 3:46 a.m. 
The other person jumped from a second-story window and was taken to a local hospital. 
The cause of the fire is unknown at this time.
